user_input: Please create hourly demand profiles for the TYNDP 2026 Scenarios. Use the 'NT', 'NT_HE' and 'NT_LE' Scenarios. Use Hydrogen as the carrier. Use the year 2030, 2035, 2040 and 2050. Split the nodes. Use Germany.
author: Assistant
default_llm_context: Perform the specified operation based on the user's input and the PLEXOS model specifications.

tasks.description: Create hourly demand profiles by decomposing annual demand figures for the TYNDP 2026 Scenarios (NT, NT_HE, NT_LE) for the years 2030, 2035, 2040, and 2050 in Germany.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: 'Please create hourly demand profiles for the TYNDP 2026 Scenarios. Use the 'NT', 'NT_HE' and 'NT_LE' Scenarios. Use Hydrogen as the carrier. Use the year 2030, 2035, 2040 and 2050. Split the nodes. Use Germany.' select the relevant demand scenario attributes.

tasks.description: Add a new energy carrier object 'Hydrogen' to the PLEXOS model.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request, identify the correct location to add the 'Hydrogen' energy carrier within the PLEXOS model.

tasks.description: Split the existing nodes in the model as specified.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request, select the nodes in Germany that require splitting according to the provided scenario details.
